TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WhitespaceSignificantCollectionAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示應該由 XAML 處理器來處理成未預期之空白字元的集合類型。

span.span: Indicates that a collection type should be processed as being whitespace significant by a XAML processor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `xml:space` 是會影響 XAML 處理泛空白字元，但正交於的用途的相關的概念。`xml:space` is a related concept that influences XAML processing of white space but is orthogonal to the purpose of . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XAML 中的空白字元處理](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Whitespace Processing in XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/whitespace-processing-in-xaml.md). 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位於 System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 使用注意事項WPF Usage Notes 舉例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]其中套用這個屬性的類別。 is an example [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] class where this attribute is applied.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
